title: Iran two most powerful policy-making institutions?

content.prompt: Which of the following are the two most powerful policy-making institutions in Iran?

choices.label: The President and the Assembly of Religious Experts
The Islamic Consultative Assembly (Majles) and the Prime Minister
The Islamic Consultative Assembly (Majles) and the Guardian Council
The Expediency Council and the Assembly of Religious Experts

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
